timeline.title: Founder & AI Engineer
timeline.description: Founded BlinkFind to develop One platform for AI-powered productivity, business automation and daily life solutions.
achievements: Our 1st product QuickFind App is your ultimate solution for lost and found items.
Built scalable AI-powered solutions serving 1000+ users
Implemented modern tech stack with React, Node.js, and AI integration

timeline.title: AI Engineer Contract
timeline.description: Contributed significantly to building and optimizing the AI Services, ensuring speed, scalability, and functionality.
achievements: Developed responsive, high-performance AI Agent, AI Integration, Virtual Agents real estate TikTok.
Collaborated with teams to deliver innovative, user-focused solutions aligned with business objectives.
Improved system performance by 40% through optimization techniques

timeline.title: Open Source Contributor (AI & Android)
timeline.description: Developed Android, AI Apps for Math-Tutor, AI Chatbot, and Rider using Java, Kotlin, Android Studio, Python and Jetpack Compose.
achievements: Contributed 50K+ lines of code to a well-established codebase, leveraging Git and GitHub.
Engineered innovative Android applications that improved user engagement by 30%.
Mentored 20+ junior developers in open source contributions

timeline.title: Bachelor of Computer Applications
timeline.description: Comprehensive study of computer science fundamentals, software engineering, and modern programming paradigms.
achievements: Led multiple project teams and hackathon participations
Specialized in AI/ML and Mobile Application Development

timeline.title: Senior Secondary Education
timeline.description: Focused on Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Computer Science with emphasis on problem-solving and analytical thinking.
achievements: Developed first mobile application during senior year
